meanings: bear, (참다) endure tolerate, put up with; (주로 부정문·의문문에 쓰여) stand

examples.korean: The pink grass is known botanically as Muhlenbergia capillaris and grows up to 90 centimeters tall. The drought-tolerant and undemanding plant is especially beautiful in early September to early November. 발음듣기 이 분홍색 풀은 식물학적으로 Muhlenbergia Capillaris라고 알려져 있고 90cm까지 자란다. 가뭄에 잘 견디며 까다롭지 않은 이 식물은 특히 9월 초에서 11월 초까지 아름답다. The Korea Times
examples.english: The pink grass is known botanically as Muhlenbergia capillaris and grows up to 90 centimeters tall. The drought-tolerant and undemanding plant is especially beautiful in early September to early November. 발음

examples.korean: The new containers have high resistance to temperature changes and chemical corrosion. 발음듣기 새로운 용기는 온도 변화에 잘 견디며 화학적 부식 현상에도 영향을 받지 않는다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The new containers have high resistance to temperature changes and chemical corrosion. 발음

examples.korean: He had survived through a lifetime of persecution and abuse. 발음듣기 그는 평생 학대와 핍박을 견디며 살아왔다 Neungyule
examples.english: He had survived through a lifetime of persecution and abuse. 발음

examples.korean: Although this story is a typical Cinderella plot depicting how a low-grade actress later becomes a super star, the musical will give the audience a hopeful message as it displays how the characters make it though the tough times to turn their dreams into reality. 발음듣기 비록 이 이야기가 어떻게 낮은 계층의 여배우가 나중에 슈퍼스타가 되는지를 그린 전형적인 신데렐라 형식이기는 하지만, 이 뮤지컬은 등장인물들이 힘든 시간들을 견디며 어떻게 자신들의 꿈들을 현실로 바꾸는지를 보여주면서 희망적인 메시지를 관중들에게 줄 거예요. TIMES CORE
examples.english: Although this story is a typical Cinderella plot depicting how a low-grade actress later becomes a super star, the musical will give the audience a hopeful message as it displays how the characters make it though the tough times to turn their dreams into reality. 발음

examples.korean: And he did take it on the chin and moved on. 발음듣기 그리고 그는 묵묵히 견디며 나아갔다. User translation Inaccurate information may be included due to the users' self-traslation. Dexter(mima****) Web Collection
examples.english: And he did take it on the chin and moved on. 발음
